speaker: Donald Trump
sentence: Yeah, we've done exercises for a long period of time, working with South Korea.
politifact_statement: We have done exercises working with South Korea for a long time. We call them war games. I call them war games. They are tremendously expensive.
verified_claim: Says the 2018 defense authorization bill includes raises for the military "for the first time in 10 years."
verified_claim_article_title: Did Donald Trump sign the first military pay raise in 10 years?
